thag3.1:1.2_0: I served the sacred fire in a grove.
thag3.1:1.3_0: Not knowing the path to purity,
thag3.1:1.4_0: I mortified my flesh in search of immortality.
thag3.1:2.1_0: I’ve gained this happiness by means of happiness:
thag3.1:2.2_0: Just one rainy season after I went forth,
thag3.1:3.1_0: I used to belong to the brahmin caste,
thag3.1:3.3_0: I am master of the three knowledges, I’m a bathed initiate,
thag3.1:3.4_0: I’m a knowledge master, a knowledge master.”
